list.name: BEAR-WITH-ME
list.description: Nita recovers x health whenever her bear hits an enemy Brawler. When Nita deals damage to an enemy Brawler, her bear regains x health.
list.descriptionHtml: Nita recovers x health whenever her bear hits an enemy Brawler. When Nita deals damage to an enemy Brawler, her bear regains x health.

list.name: HYPER-BEAR
list.description: Nita's bear attacks faster. Time between swipes is reduced by x%.
list.descriptionHtml: Nita's bear attacks faster. Time between swipes is reduced by x%.
